articles.title: France's Macron hosts Tajik leader for talks on Afghanistan - Guardian
articles.description: French President Emmanuel Macron hosted Tajikistan’s leader for rare talks on Wednesday, vowing to help the Central Asian state as it deals with the aftermath of the Taliban takeover of neighbouring Afghanistan. The invitation to the Elysee Palace — a rare ho…

articles.title: In Netflix’s ‘Squid Game’, an insight into desperate lives of South Korea’s South Asian migrant workers - The Indian Express
articles.description: For many viewers of Netflix's 'Squid Game', Ali and his tragic story have come across as surprising coming from South Korea.

articles.title: 2409 travellers from eight countries approved to enter Singapore under Vaccinated Travel Lane - The Star Online
articles.description: SINGAPORE (The Straits Times/Asia News Network): More than 2,000 travellers have been granted a pass to enter Singapore under a quarantine-free travel scheme, after the first day of applications opening for visitors from eight countries.
